DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effectiveness PriMatrix treatment DFUs subject without significantly compromise arterial circulation .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter , Prospective , Observational Study With PriMatrix Treatment Neuropathic Diabetic Foot Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Type I Type II diabetes investigatorconfirmed reasonable metabolic control Peripheral neuropathy A full thickness diabetic plantar foot ulcer least 1 cm2 exceed 10 cm2 area An ulcer existence minimum 30 day , prior day screen Suspected confirm signs/symptoms wound infection Wounds expose bone tendon Hypersensitivity bovine collagen
